03b_changes: Merged 'Customer Interview Playbook' and 'Customer Interview Playbook 2' into single 'interview_playbook' file
Merged 'Voice of Customer' collection templates with 'Voice of Customer Database' structure into 'voc_collection'
Merged 'Voice of Customer Database' and 'Voice of Customer Database 2' quote records into single 'voc_database'

feedback_loops.tension: VOC produced 31 LMNT quotes at saturation. Interview Insights backfilled with LMNT proxy data, labeled as proxy throughout.
feedback_loops.resolution: Interview Insights backfilled with LMNT proxy data. Must be replaced with IonWave-specific data post-launch.

key_blockers: LMNT customer voice at saturation (31 quotes) connected downstream via proxy data; no IonWave-specific interviews yet; Female Wellness ICP needs deeper research
next_action: Begin IonWave customer interviews post-launch; validate Female Wellness ICP assumptions; collect fasting-specific VOC
